com.sniflabs.hoptoad
Class HoptoadNotice

java.lang.Object
  com.sniflabs.hoptoad.HoptoadNotice

public class HoptoadNotice
extends java.lang.Object

HoptoadNotice:
A Java wrapper for hoptoad error reporting application, because java guys need access to cool error reporting too!!

requires:
yamlbeans from http://sourceforge.net/projects/yamlbeans/

Sample use: 

 catch (Exception exp) {
   HoptoadNotice notice = 
        new HoptoadNotice("fff9de2222222e156015fb875844de43",exp);
   notice.postData(true);
 }

Version:
0.1 (may be quite flakey!)
Author:
Noah Paessel (noah@sniflabs.com)
See Also:
yamlbeans

Constructor Detail

HoptoadNotice

public HoptoadNotice()
default constructor. Doesn't help anyone, but is required for bean-ness. initializes data structures.

HoptoadNotice

public HoptoadNotice(java.lang.String key,
                     java.lang.Throwable exception)
Create a new HoptoadNotice notice for sending to hoptoadapp.com
NOTE: this does not send actually send the notice

Parameters:
key - Your HoapToadApp API key.
exception - the exception you want to log
Method Detail

toYaml

public java.lang.String toYaml()
return the YAML string for this notice.
NOTE: HoptoadNotice reuqires a java YAML library called yamlbeans. you can get it from http://sourceforge.net/projects/yamlbeans/ NOTE: It seems like hoptoad hates the "!" thingies that this library creates. I don't feel like understanding what this is all about, so I replaced the "!" thingies and class names with NOTHING. Huh.

Returns:
the YAML for the HopToadNotice datastructure
See Also:
https://sourceforge.net/projects/yamlbeans/

postData

public void postData(boolean debug)
Send the data to the HopToadApp. Sets HTTP headers, and then sends the YAML file. Optionally prints out the YAML text if you pass in true for debug.

Parameters:
debug - set to true to see the YAML sent, and the XML server results.
